first_translate: mr. magician! are you alright?
some monsters survived!
get ready  for battle!
the giant was aiming straight at me...

hangle: 이 소년이 나와 함께 구르지 않았다면
first_translate: if this boy hadn’t rolled around on the ground with me just now,
I would’ve died.

hangle: 죽은 줄 알았더니, 숨이 붙은 개체가 있었나?!
first_translate: I thought they were all dead... but there’s one that's still alive?!

hangle: 어떡해. 날 안고 굴러서 부상이 악화됐나 봐.
first_translate: shoot... I think my injuries got worse from rolling around while carrying him.
it’ll be hard to support him as we dodge their attacks!
don’t worry about me.
but more importantly...
come to your senses...!
and when our faces came face to face in that moment,

hangle: 나는 퍼뜩 한 가지 사실을 깨달았다.
first_translate: that’s when I finally realized something.
his old clothes made him look like a mercenary.
his hair was blacker than the night sky.
his eyes were a beautiful shade of blue-gray,
and he had striking features despite being covered in dust.
no wonder I didn’t recognize him earlier because he looks younger than what I imagined.

hangle: 이 녀석, 남자 주인공인 시그렌 아냐?!
first_translate: isn’t this guy siegren, the male protagonist?!

hangle: ※본 작품은 저작권법에 의해 보호를 받는 저작물로 불법 복제와 캡처 등을 이용한 무단 전재 및 유포, 공유하는 것을 금합니다.
